about_the_game:
A thrilling, Carmageddon-inspired roguelite game blending high-octane driving and action with strategic elements.

Experience the heart-pounding, high-octane action of our Carmageddon-inspired roguelite game in this exclusive demo. Get behind the wheel of a single customizable car and immerse yourself in the thrilling chaos of the factory level.

Key Features of the Demo:

  • Customizable Vehicle: Start with one versatile car and equip it with a range of modifications, including weapons, spikes, and other deadly enhancements. Your vehicle's setup will be key to your survival and success.

  • Factory Level: Navigate the gritty, industrial factory level filled with obstacles, enemies, and strategic opportunities. Engage in explosive battles and use the environment to your advantage.

  • Strategic Gameplay: While protecting your own car, you'll need to complete various strategic mission goals. This includes crashing enemy vehicles and sending them into hydraulic presses to earn credits.

  • Roguelite Mechanics: Adapt your strategy and vehicle modifications to overcome obstacles and foes.

  • Stunning Graphics: Powered by the Unreal 5 engine, the demo showcases the game's breathtaking visuals, bringing the chaotic world and intense car battles to life.

Discover the perfect blend of driving, action, and strategy in this exciting demo. Customize your ride, conquer the factory level, and get a taste of the full game's thrilling potential.
